title: Actuator Control Module
description:
ACTUATOR_UD is a reversing contactor interface with locking and confgu￾rable timing. With additional return inputs a activation was prevented as

long as a relais stuck. The module has an automatic and a manual mode.

In automatic mode (ON = TRUE and Manual = FALSE), the input of the UD

decides about the direction and ON/OFF. As soon as the manual input is

TRUE starts the Manual mode and outputs will follow only the inputs UP

and DN. UP and DN may never be both TRUE, if happens both outputs gets

FALSE. With a safety-switch-of input OFF the outputs are switched of in

both the manual and in automatic mode at any time. 

Two return inputs YUP_IN and YDN_IN serve as separate inputs for the

state of the relays due to the avoid activating the output of a other relais

in case of a failure of one relay module. This error is reported through er￾ror messages at the output STATUS. The feedback function is only availa￾ble if the confg variable OUT_RETURN is set to TRUE. Status reports all ac￾tivities of the module in order to provide them for a data record. The sta￾tus output is ESR compatible and combinable with other ESR modules

The output status reports two errors: 

1: YUP can not be set because YDN_IN TRUE.

2: YDN can not be set because YUP_IN TRUE.

The Confg variables TON and TOFF defne a minimum ontime and a dead

time between two output impulses and therefore large motors or transmis￾sions can be switched, even if they needs a start and stop time.

name: ACTUATOR_UD

input.name: UD
input.description: Direction input in Auto Mode (UP = TRUE)

input.name: ON
input.description: Indicates if the module is in Auto Mode (TRUE when in Auto Mode)

input.name: MANUAL
input.description: TRUE if Manual Mode is selected

input.name: UP
input.description: Enable UP direction in Manual Mode

input.name: DN
input.description: Enable DN direction in Manual Mode

output.name: STATUS
output.description: ESR compliant status and error output

in/out.name: OUT_RETURN
in/out.description: Switches the return inputs YUP_IN and YDN_IN

return_value.description: The function does not return a value.
